segments.text: I see the water from the sink flowing onto the floor, creating a slippery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such a waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel annoyed that she hasn't noticed the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are too busy with the cookies to care about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something about it before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to see such a simple problem being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for them to realize what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious they all are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they notice soon, before the kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR
